body:
I remember when I first started playing on this server, like....two years ago. What ever happened to the survival games? They were the bomb.com and all my friends loved playing on them. No other servers have the same version as Avicus did. It had a boss system where we could vote for the map we'd play on and the maps weren't super massive but they were still neat and creative...why did it all stop? Will Avicus ever have survival games again? How far into the future will that be?
